title: elan
description: portfolio website of a berlin-based event agency. elan conceptualises and executes b2b and b2c events for clients in music, art, and culture. their mission is to challenge traditional power dynamics and knowledge flows by centering diversity and inclusion.

title: martinslieder
description: little companion to help you sing along during martin's parade. if you are there – out in the dark – and do not remember the songs by heart, this website will get you going.

title: momo
description: welcome page for my sons birthday.

title: game of life
description: arcade game using conway's 'game of life' in various places through out the experience. it was the first of three projects during my web dev bootcamp.
